title: [Community] Proposal: Building the 4thTech Discord Server in the near future
body:
Summary:
With the recent community and user rise, a more structured communication ecosystem should be enabled, that could replace the Telegram group in the near future.

Proposal:
4thTech telegram group is up and running now from 2018 non-stop. As the community and user base grows, there is a need for a more structured communication environment. We are proposing the establishment of the 4thTech Discord server, where we can create a creative community environment, a future home of the 4thTech project.  We are proposing several different discussion groups: 

⚡️ Announcements 
⚡️ Guides
⚡️ Events
⚡️ User support
⚡️ DEV space
⚡️ FOUR Multiverse
⚡️ Partner space
⚡️ Grants
⚡️ Comunity calls
⚡️ Twitter, YouTube, Medium feeds
⚡️ Library & Faq resources
⚡️ Opportunities, Grants, Jobs
⚡️ Other

Voting:
Voting on Snapshot is FREE! No gas is needed as the process is performed off-chain. MinBalance of 4k ERC-20 FOUR has been set, which equals the minimum balance required to vote on a proposal. This vote is being conducted via approval voting with a single vote option. The voting power of each wallet will be dictated, where 1 FOUR = 1 vote. The platform weights votes by the amount of a given token a participating wallet address holds. Once a proposal reaches public referenda, token holders can vote on it using their own FOUR tokens. 

Read more: 
⚡️ https://medium.com/the4thpillar/four-token-signaling-on-snapshot-a-decentralized-voting-system-62739a60d5b3

Learn more about the project:
⚡️ https://4thtech.io/
⚡️ https://wiki.4thtech.io/
⚡️ https://app.4thtech.io/
⚡️ https://twitter.com/4thtechProject
